ul.li: The background of the box generated by the root element covers the entire canvas.

body.p: If statement above is passed, then the background of this page should be a flag pattern. The rule applied is "body {background: url("flagbg.gif") }". All other properties of this page should be UA-default. aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa
